content: ### New node: n8n Form Use the [n8n Form node](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.form.md) to create user-facing forms with multiple pages. You can add other nodes with custom logic between to process user input. Start the workflow with a [n8n Form Trigger](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.formtrigger.md). Additionally you can: - Set default selections with query parameters - Define the form with a JSON array of objects - Show a completion screen and redirect to another URL
